title: Radiatively Induced Lorentz and CPT Violation in QED at Finite Temperature
abstract: In this paper we evaluate the induced Lorentz and CPT violating Chern-Simons term in the QED action at finite temperature. We do this using the method of derivative expansion of fermion determinants. Also, we use the imaginary-time formalism to calculate the temperature dependence of the Chern-Simons term
